A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disapointing storyline twists sucked the fun out of this one. What they call \"character development\" was \"character degeneration\"\, especially for Luke. Some characters are so conflicted that I no longer care about them.The attack on the big cannon sequence was totally botched. Special effects were great. I'm not going to add this one to my collection. I'll probably see SW IX just to see how the saga ends\, but it's no longer a \"must see\". I'll stop here to avoid posting spoilers.
